title: Arsenal transfer news and rumours: Juventus plot summer move for Hector Bellerin
description: All the latest Arsenal transfer news and rumours from across the British and European press on Wednesday, January 17.
content: Juventus are planning an end-of-season move for Arsenal right-back Hector Bellerin, says Calciomercato.The Spain international, 22, is currently contracted to the Gunners until the summer of 2023.Elsewhere, Jack Wilshere has been offered a new contract by Arsenal, but the north London club have asked the player to take a pay-cut, claims the Mirror.The midfielder has been plagued by a succession of injuries during his career at the Emirates.Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang is pleading with Borussia Dortmund to let him complete a transfer to Arsenal, reports in the Mirror.The Gunners were believed to be optimistic of signing the Gabon international striker for Â£53.4m in January, according to Sky Sports' Spanish football expert Guillem Balague.Arsenal target Malcom could be off to Liverpool, says Bordeaux manager Jocelyn Gourvennec in the Sun.The Brazil forward had been expected to move to the Emirates in the January transfer window.Meanwhile, Henrikh Mkhitaryan is nearing a move to Arsenal in a swap deal with Alexis Sanchez after accepting he has no future at Manchester United, reports the Daily Mail.The Armenia playmaker has struggled to get regular game time at Old Trafford so far this campaign.
